name: Disaster Delivery (Bored Pixel jam version)
description:
There is a monster outbreak and no one is allowed to leave their homes until the Hero deals with it.

Until then, they need someone to get them what they need. That's where Disaster delivery comes in!

A short rpg where you play as Disaster delivery agent, Leah.

Unfortunately i couldn't add in music, It was a busy week but this was my first game jam and i didn't want to miss it.

I plan on releasing a much longer version of the game soon, i hope you enjoy it and sorry for any bugs i missed.
